title: 需要一个限制血量排数(经验栏上方的心)的插件
author: jyh1921
txt_content:
所需如题
由于rpl并不带有这个功能
表示很无奈

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
ILS
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-518153-1-1.html

掉落血量那个看配置文件
#自然伤害调控
#这里的伤害是按原本的20血为比例扣血的
  block_explosion:
  #方块爆炸
    damage: 20
    #伤害值
    durabilityLost: 40
    #装备耐久消耗
  cactus:
  #仙人掌
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 10
  drowning:
  #溺水
    damage: 10
    durabilityLost: 0
  entity_explosion:
    damage: 20
    durabilityLost: 40
  fall:
  #高空跌落
    damage: 12
    durabilityLost: 20
  fire:
  #火
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 10
  fire_tick:
  #火虫？
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 6
  lava:
  #岩浆
    damage: 20
    durabilityLost: 30
  lightning:
  #闪电
    damage: 25
    durabilityLost: 60
  magic:
  #法术
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 3
  poison:
  #中毒
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 2
  starvation:
  #饥饿
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 0
  suffocation:
  #窒息
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 0
  thorns:
  #荆棘
    damage: 2
    durabilityLost: 4
  damage:
  #攻击伤害
    durabilityLost: 1

把我加粗的选项设置为你想要的值

replies.author: 鬼酱丶
replies.txt_content: 用ils就可以了,ils自带限制,插件原帖:http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-518153-1-1.html

replies.txt_content:

用ils就可以了,ils自带限制,插件原帖:http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-518153-1-1.html
